Text: HiStan I just wanted to write you and say hi and ask you a couple of questions I wrote to Caron a couple of days ago to see how she was doing and she told me that she has a horse show coming up She sounded pretty excited about it I hope she does well I got to pitch for the first time last weekend I pitched against Florida State who is number one and I did pretty good I pitched innings and didnt give up any runs and gave up hits I pitched against them again this weekend and gave up hits and run in innings I guess Ill have to teach you how to throw strike someday The other thing I wanted to talk to you about is this summer When you were down in Orlando last month you mentioned something about an internship Tara and I really thought that it would be really fun to come out to Texas this summer to do that I was just wandering if that was still an option and if so does the offer still stand I know there is still a lot Tara and I to talk about like where we are going to live and things like that but we were just thinking that it would be a great oppurtunity for the botb of us Tell Debbie I said hello and we are all wishing her the best Thank you for everything Kenny
